src:
Brez lovilnih mrež pešpot ostaja nevarna
06 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Alenka Penjak

S klifa je na priljubljeno pešpot med Piranom in Fieso ob zadnjem deževju znova padlo kamenje, kljub sanaciji, med katero so delavci letos poleti s klifa očistili velike skale. Zgodba se bo ponovila, pravijo pristojni, rešitev pa bi prinesle le lovilne mreže. V piranski enoti Zavoda za varstvo narave,...



Delavci Okolja Piran so padle kamne že očistili, pričakovati pa je, da bodo novi prileteli že ob naslednjih padavinah.  Foto: Sonja Ribolica

PIRAN > Egon Stibilj, vodja Civilne zaščite Piran, je po ogledu pešpoti naročil čiščenje padlih kamnov, ki so tja prileteli po sobotnem in ...
Celotna vsebina je na voljo le naročnikom.

text:
Without fishing nets, footpaths remain dangerous
06 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Alenka Penjak

Rocks fell again on the popular footpath between Piran and Fiesa in the last rain, despite the remediation, during which workers cleared large rocks from the cliff this summer. The story will be repeated, the authorities say, and only fishing nets would come up with a solution. In the Piran unit of the Institute for Nature Conservation, ...



The workers of the Piran Environment have already cleaned up the fallen stones, and it is expected that the new ones will arrive in the next rainfall. Photo by Sonja Ribolica

PIRAN> After seeing the footpath, Egon Stibilj, the head of the Piran Civil Protection, ordered the cleaning of fallen stones, which came there after Saturday and ...
